Senior US official discusses Sri Lanka's IMF program in ColomboSenior U.S. diplomat Richard Verma on Friday met Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Foreign Minister Ali Sabry in Colombo, and discussed Sri Lanka's economic recovery and progress on its IMF program, the U.S. State Department said. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 00:26:41 GMT CQNIXT7JLJMDZLAPYZWPGVQ6TA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/senior-us-official-discusses-sri-lankas-imf-program-colombo-2024-02-24/Kanishka Singh世界亚太地区
U.S. rice exports to Haiti have unhealthy levels of arsenic, study findsU.S. rice exports to Haiti, which account for the bulk of supplies of the country's key food staple, contain unhealthy levels of arsenic and cadmium, heavy metals that can increase risks of cancer and heart disease, according to a recent study by the University of Michigan. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 00:05:09 GMT 4HBX5XHI6VOVZHNCCTLP26ZLBA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/us-rice-exports-haiti-have-unhealthy-levels-arsenic-study-finds-2024-02-24/Reuters世界美洲
UK to help replenish Ukraine's artillery reserves with $311 mln packageBritain will spend 245 million pounds ($311 million) over the next year to boost Ukraine’s artillery ammunition reserves, the defence ministry said on Saturday - the two year anniversary of Russia's invasion. Sat, 24 Feb 2024 00:04:49 GMT 7JTWL5FNENOOXDGFQ7RLZNDH5I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/uk-help-replenish-ukrainian-artillery-reserves-with-311-mln-package-2024-02-24/Reuters世界欧洲
Houthi attack on freighter Rubymar caused significant damage to ship, US saysAn attack by Yemen's Houthis on the freighter Rubymar caused significant damage to the ship and an 18-mile (29-km) oil slick, the U.S. military's Central Command said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 23:42:11 GMT EZDXSLXA5ZLG7LYH35JTU4OIDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthi-attack-freighter-rubymar-caused-significant-ship-damage-us-says-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中东地区
Fresh warnings issued for bushfire-threatened Australian townsA massive out-of-control bushfire in Australia's Victoria state that has destroyed properties and killed livestock prompted fresh evacuation alerts on Saturday for several rural towns. Scholz, marking Ukraine invasion anniversary, calls for stronger EuropeEurope needs to beef up its defences and make sure it can weather any military attack from outside, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said in comments mark two years since Russia invaded Ukraine. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 23:02:16 GMT 5UIET6VFVNMH5F5SDLPOOQNBI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/scholz-marking-ukraine-invasion-anniversary-calls-stronger-europe-2024-02-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Fire at Brazil's Paranagua port shuts 3 berths, say shipping agenciesA fire that broke out at an important export terminal for agricultural commodities at the Paranagua port, in Brazil, halted operations at three berths, two shipping companies said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 22:48:58 GMT RWZOVMV66JKSPPTSIXZYPOMS3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/fire-brazil-paranagua-port-shuts-3-berths-say-shipping-agcies-2024-02-23/Marcelo Teixeira世界美洲
Former Vitol oil trader convicted of Ecuador, Mexico corruption chargesA former oil trader at Vitol, one of the world's largest energy trading companies, was convicted on Friday of corruption charges stemming from more than $1 million in bribes he paid to officials in Ecuador and Mexico to win business.
